value:
Your castle smells great! What is
that smell? It makes me a little
sleepy...

Right now, everything is just
so, you know, FUN!

I get to be with everyone all the
time 'cause you called me! Thanks!

I used to have scary dreams...
about becoming a monster and
stuff... But I don't have them now!

I went into town the other day.
Guess what? Everyone was so
nice! You should go sometime!
I came to say hello! Hi!
What's going on? I feel all hot...

I don't have to sleep anymore?
I can stay with everyone? Yay!
Wait, what about vegetables?

Heeheehee! I'm so happy not to be
alone anymore!$k$pI have so many friends here—so
many people to talk to!$k$pAnd it's all because you
summoned me here.$k$pYou're my favorite, you know.
Let's stay together forever!
I had another bad dream last night.
Would you tell me a story about where you're from?
You know what? I'm not lonely anymore!
Hi! Did you come to visit? Wait, where am I?
